## Round 1

  * Pick someone to record flags for each round

  * Draw 21 flags on whiteboard

  * Discuss strategy w/ your group for 5 minutes

  * Play the game!

    - Record your data: 

    1. How many flags taken each turn
    2. Which team took the last flag

After each team has played at least once,

  * Find new opposing teams (losing teams move clockwise)
  * [Play Round 2](round2.qmd){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"}
